name: 01workflow
on: push

jobs:
  nome-01:
    runs-on: [ self-hosted, Linux ] 
    steps: 
      - name: Passo 1
        run: echo Hello, world!
  nome-02:
    runs-on: [ self-hosted, Linux ]
    needs: nome-01
    steps:
      - name: NOME-02-SEQUENCIA1
        run: echo Sequencia 1

      - name: NOME-02-SEQUENCIA2
        run: echo Sequencia 2
